Subject: Maximal & Predicon A Love Story...

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He chuckled as he took her in his arms.
"Maximal, Predicon, these lines are foolish. We're Transformers. and you
are the one for me."
He began to kiss her neck. He wasn't sure how far he should go, but it
seemed like the right thing to do.

::DrillBit::

He gave KitKat a smile, and stepted out with Diamond.
